ygData.subject: SID stripping not working ?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi I have set my canonicalization rules to strip SIDs for tracking already seen URLs and it is in enabled in the crawl job s expert settings.  However, when I

Hi I have set my canonicalization rules to strip SIDs for tracking 
already=
 seen URLs and it is in enabled in the crawl job's expert 
settings.  Howev=
er, when I look at the crawl.log there are a bunch of 
duplicates (all the =
same file size) where the URL is exactly the same 
except for sid=3Dnnnnn a=
t the end of the query string.

I also tried pausing the crawl and adding a=
n additional Regex rule 
but to no avail.  Any idea why this is happening? =
 I am using 
Heritrix v1.10.0.

Any help appreciated.  This crawl has been =
runnig hours and hours due 
to this sid loop.
